column7: texas. forrest was born on january 8
column9: missouri and was a resident of rosharon for 30 years. he was a member of the baptist faith. forrest served his country in the united states marine corps. and later went to work as a quality control inspector. he is preceded in death by his parents
column13: leon. forrest is survived by his wife
column32: numerous other relatives and friends. visitation will be held from 5:00 p. m. to 8:00 p. m. tuesday
column34: 2015 at scott funeral home. funeral services will be at 2:00 p. m. wednesday
column36: 2015 at scott funeral home. interment will follow at confederate cemetery
column38: texas. arrangements under the direction of the scott family
